price: Kurrsesi! Ne do ta shënojmë atë që flet dhe do t’ia zgjasim vuajtjen.
arabic: كَلَّاۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلۡعَذَابِ مَدّٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: kallā sanaktubu mā yaqūlu wanamuddu lahu mina al-ʿadhābi maddan
